sample

Class State.PlayedSpell

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.State.PlayedSpell
  • Enclosing class:
    State

    public class State.PlayedSpell
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the category of played spells. The constructor takes the Hero that is trying to play the spell, the spell card and the optional target that the Hero has chosen, turning a spelled card into a played spell. A played spell can either damage or heal and its target(s) can be random targets, all friendly minions, all enemy minions, enemy hero, or your hero The case in which the effect of the spell has a random target is dealt with in the getRandomTarget function. A random number from zero to the number of played cards + 2 heroes is drawn. This number is the index of the card/hero that will be set as a target.
